titles.title: Weighing Intelligence for Smarter Energy Act of 2007
WISE Act of 2007
A bill to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit to Congress an unclassified report on energy security and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7650-7651)
Read twice and referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.

bill.summary:
6/13/2007--Introduced.
Weighing Intelligence for Smarter Energy Act of 2007 or WISE Act of 2007 - Requires the Director of National Intelligence to report to Congress on the long-term energy security of the United States, including assessments of: (1) key energy issues that have U.S. national security or foreign policy implications; and (2) the future of world energy supplies.
